code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import UserCard from"./components/UserCard";import SearchBar from"./components/SearchBar";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[search,setSearch]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setUsers(data)).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching users:",error));},[]);const filteredUsers=users.filter(user=>user.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User Directory"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{value:search,onChange:setSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-list",children:filteredUsers.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserCard,{user:user},user.id))})]});}export default App;
